name: SUPA ROKKU MAN
description:
****Warning: Language, Violence****DEMO ONLY

In the near future, a rock becomes conscious and realizes he has powa! His mission is to find his bod. 

The main focus of Suparokkuman was to upgrade my skills while testing my capabilities by trying many new aspects in game design. This  demo is my version of the  japanese megaman title Rokkuman which has culminated into a parody of few familiar favorite games and their mechanics.

The genre falls somewhere in between action and supa casual crafting boss rush.

More bosses to come and some polish.

The story derives from my outlook on the relationship between nature and mankind.

At the moment you will want to avoid the grown mushrooms and avoid the spores from growing by hitting the cap before the stalk sprouts

The mushrooms will be used to make ore but I haven't implemented them into the crafting system yet  because I haven't finished many of the tools ore unlocks. The mushrooms does pay a  price so you can carry nothing else after carrying a single mushroom. 

The branches from the trees  can be used to craft four tools: platform I; platform II; door; heat.

To open crafting exchange UI you must right click the blinking button above Enoki's head,  she floats back and forth on the platform above/below?

Let me know what you think!
